group_1.narration: I continued our search for@the missing Kazumi and Kaoru...@but along the way,@I found some reliable allies.
Kako Natsume and Akira Shinobu.@With the two of them alongside me,@I set out once again.

group_1.textLeft: Um... I dunno that much about novels, but I've@heard of you, Misaki-sensei!
My friend lent me "My First Bucket Pudding"@to read!

group_1.textRight: But if at all possible, could I ask you@not to call me "sensei"?

group_1.textLeft: Really? We usually call people we respect "sensei"@at the dojo, though...
Ooh, I've got it! Misaki-shihan!@Or 'meijin', or 'shishou', or... no, 'kyoshou'!

group_1.textRight: But only AFTER we find my friends.@Right now, I'm just a Magical Girl.
I want to prioritize the search for Kazumi and Kaoru@above all else.

group_1.textLeft: Got it! We'll be sure to find 'em in no time!
I swear it on my name as@"Sankyoin's Troubleshooter"!

group_1.textRight: Oh? I thought you didn't like that nickname@very much...

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah, but I just thought it'd explain things@nice and quick...
At any rate, I help folks in trouble! That's me!

group_1.textRight: Thank you. Now, sorry if this is abrupt,@but do you have a plan?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, about that— I was thinkin' we could enlist@the Blue Seas Family's help.
They're this organization with their own info@network. Our friend Meiyui's real close with them.

group_1.textRight: ...Sounds perfect for a missing person case.@Have you contacted said friend?

group_1.textLeft: Um, she said she's very busy today... she didn't have@time to meet us out here.

group_1.textRight: Let's go pay her a visit, then.

group_1.narration: We went to Minaminagi Ward in search of Meiyui.

group_1.textLeft: I think we can run into her roooughly around@this area...

group_1.textRight: Another one!@What is even going on, today?!

group_1.textLeft: You two— you came at a good time!@We're going to fight!
And you there, with the glasses.@This is dangerous, so you should run.

group_1.textRight: Thanks for the warning...@But I can fight too.
